transcript: I don't know why it is, but every time I reach out for something I want I have to pull back because other people will suffer my whole bloody life time after time after time.

segments.text: I don't know why it is, but every time I reach out for something I want I have to pull back
because other people will suffer my whole bloody life time after time after time.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: I don't know why it is.  But every time I reach out for something I want, I have to pull back because other people will suffer.  My whole bloody life, time after time, after time.
